apps.name: 应用程序
apps.desc: 显示您当前安装的谷歌 chrome 浏览器应用程序。

bookmarks.name: 书签
bookmarks.desc: 显示并定制您的收藏夹和其他链接。

chrome_bookmarks.name: 书签
chrome_bookmarks.desc: 显示您的Chrome标签页，并可指定只显示某个文件夹。

calc.name: 计算器
calc.desc: 显示一个支持简单运算的计算器

calendar.name: 日历
calendar.desc: 显示您谷歌日历即中将发生的事件。
calendar.title: Agenda
calendar.noevents: No events found in the near future, it looks like your schedule's clear!

clock.name: 时钟
clock.desc: Offers alarm, time, timer, and stopwatch functionality.
clock.title: 时钟

feedly.name: Feedly
feedly.desc: 用可配置的格式显示您Feedly账户中的文章。

mark_options.scroll: 滚动滚动条经过其或点击其时

feedly.author: 由

notes.name: 便签
notes.desc: 插入简单、 可编辑的便签。

now.name: Google Now
now.desc: 显示Google Now卡片，提供包括并不限于航班状态和包裹追踪的各种卡片。
now.authorize: 在任何东西显示之前您需要授予iChrome查看您Google Now卡片的权限。

notifications.name: Google通知
notifications.desc: 显示您谷歌服务的通知，例如Google+

settings.subreddit_help:
输入在Reddit分类网页链接/r/后的字符。

例如，科技类的链接是http://www.reddit.com/r/technology所以您需要输入technology
settings.subreddit_placeholder: 输入Reddit分类的显示链接。（例如technology）

tasks.name: 任务栏
tasks.desc: 从你的其中一个Google任务列表显示可编辑的任务栏
tasks.title: 任务栏
tasks.authorize: 在任何东西显示之前您需要到设置选项卡中在您的Google Tasks里指定一个列表。

twitter.name: Twitter
twitter.desc: 显示您的信息流或指定列表中的Tweets。
twitter.authorize_msg: 在显示任何东西之前您需要授予iChrome权限以查看您账户中的推文。

wolfram.name: Wolfram|Alpha
wolfram.desc: 插入一个小巧的Wolfram Alpha搜索框。

youtube.name: Youtube
youtube.desc: 显示热门视频或显示特定用户的视频。

format_options.large_2: 一个大位置两个小位置
format_options.large_4: 一个大位置四个小位置

settings.from_help:
这必须是与您查看个人资料时完全一致的用户名。

此值永远不会包含空格。

quotes.name: 报价
quotes.desc: 在您加载加载页面时更新报价或每天只更新一次。

html.name: HTML
html.desc: 在iframe标签中显示您完全自定义的HTML代码。

sitelink.name: Site Link
sitelink.desc: Displays a link, optionally with a title and thumbnail

stats.name: System Statistics
stats.desc: Keep an eye on your system with realtime statistics

search.name: 搜索
search.desc: Embed a search box in your page for easy access

settings.param_placeholder: The parameter where the query goes, i.e. "q"

pushbullet.name: Pushbullet
pushbullet.desc: Keep track of notifications from your phone and other devices
pushbullet.no_key: It doesn't look like you're signed in to Pushbullet.  Sign in now to connect this widget.

directions.name: Directions
directions.desc: Get directions to and from nearly anywhere right from your homepage
directions.error: Something went wrong while trying to load the directions you requested.
directions.error2: Please check the start and destination addresses you entered.

pocket.name: Pocket
pocket.desc: Display a list of your saved articles, videos, and web pages from Pocket
pocket.no_key: You'll need to give iChrome access to your Pocket account before it can load your links.

analytics.name: 分析
analytics.desc: 显示您谷歌分析中的各项指标
analytics.noprofile:
看起来您未选择一个项目！

请尝试通过右上角的扳手图标选择一个项目。

classroom.name: Classroom
classroom.desc: Keep up to date with your Google Classroom assignments and classes

currency.name: 货币转换
currency.desc: 让您在169种货币之间进行转换。

dictionary.name: Dictionary
dictionary.desc: Quickly look up the definition and synonyms for a word
dictionary.search_placeholder: Enter a word or term here

drive.name: 网盘
drive.desc: 显示您Google Drive最近更改的文件。
drive.authMessage: You'll need to give iChrome permission to view files in your Drive before anything can be shown here.

gmail.name: Gmail
gmail.desc: 显示您的 Gmail 收件箱，在任何地方您都可以查看您的E-Mail

iframe.name: iFrame
iframe.desc: 在您选择的位置用 iframe 嵌入网页。

news.name: 新闻
news.desc: 按类别和国家版本来显示当前的头条新闻。

settings.title: 小部件标题
settings.title_placeholder: 输入小部件窗口标题或留空隐藏

recentlyclosed.name: 最近关闭
recentlyclosed.desc: 显示您最近关闭的标签页

rss.name: RSS 订阅

settings.title: 小部件标题
settings.title_placeholder: 输入小部件窗口标题或留空隐藏
settings.feeds_help: Click any feed to edit it
settings.feeds_placeholder: Enter a feed URL and press Enter to add
settings.feeds_pro_only: Only Pro users can have multiple feeds in each widget. Get Pro in the settings.

rss.feed_error:
试图在%s获取信息时出现错误。
请重复检查此链接然后更改小部件设置

sports.name: 体育运动
sports.desc: Displays scores, schedules, and news from your favorite teams.

settings.teams_placeholder: Enter a team name and press Enter to add

sports.pro_splash1: Sports news is a Pro-only feature.

stocks.name: 股票
stocks.desc: 显示您指定的股票信息。

settings.stocks_placeholder: Type a company or exchange name and hit Enter

stocks.pro_splash1: Realtime data, charts, news, and detailed stock information are Pro-only features.

todo.name: 待办事项
todo.desc: 显示交互式的待办事项列表。
todo.title: 待办事项列表

settings.tags_placeholder: 输入标记的名称并按Enter键确认

topsites.name: 常用网站
topsites.desc: 显示您经常访问/常用的的网站。

traffic.name: 交通
traffic.desc: 根据交通状况显示当需要多久到家或多久上班。

settings.home_placeholder: 这将用于下班后的目的地
settings.work_placeholder: 这将用于上班前的目的地

translate.name: 翻译
translate.desc: Lets you quickly translate to and from 90 languages as you type

unread.name: 未读
unread.desc: 显示您Gmail邮箱中的未读邮件数目。

voice.name: Google Voice
voice.desc: 显示您Google Voice中未查看的来电和短信。

weather.name: 天气
weather.desc: 显示当前天气和接下来的 4 天的天气预报。

settings.location_placeholder: 请输入一个位置，然后按 enter 键
